metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5334 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Double free vulnerability in the gnutls_x509_ext_import_proxy function in GnuTLS before 3.3.26 and 3.5.x before 3.5.8 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via crafted policy language information in an X.509 certificate with a Proxy Certificate Information extension.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> looks like this was introduced by https://gitlab.com/gnutls/gnutls/commit/2bd323f728d75c44a2d7398503178b75e5b63263

criterions.comment: gnutls28: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
